data.name: A Token War Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: Relive the thrill of conquest with the fully orchestral musical score of A Token War. This Soundtrack album includes 18 original tracks composed by Noa Beazley, featuring the guitar playing of Joel Kent.
data.about_the_game: Relive the thrill of conquest with the fully orchestral musical score of A Token War. This Soundtrack album includes 18 original tracks composed by Noa Beazley, featuring the guitar playing of Joel Kent.
data.short_description: Relive the thrill of conquest with the fully orchestral musical score of A Token War. This Soundtrack album includes 18 original tracks composed by Noa Beazley, featuring the guitar playing of Joel Kent.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 40 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 600 MB available space
